item.title: Gambling update
item.dc:creator: @l11 l
item.description:
@l11 wrote:

[quote=“Bowser jr, post:25, topic:509086”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=627330.msg4263322#msg4263322 date=1363664345]

Planted mithril seeds now always grow the same coloured flower, although picking the flower will still result in a randomly coloured flower in your inventory.

Inb4 “Guess what flower pops in my inventory”
[/quote]
True, but you are making it much harder for people to appear trustworthy. You would have better luck by trimming people’s armour.[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Gambling update
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

xxlukexx:

It’s a shame burnt food stacks now.

It does? And not cooked… Bullshit…
I wish they’d do the same to rune ess. Lol craft 60k rune ess in one trip.

Read full topic

item.title: Gambling update
item.dc:creator: @Cruel_Truth Cruel Truth
item.description:
@Cruel_Truth wrote:

[quote=“runescape sucks, post:28, topic:509086”][quote author=Cruel Truth link=topic=627330.msg4263662#msg4263662 date=1363721610]

26 burnt food, 1 free space before for plant.
[/quote] There are 28 inventory spots so it would be 27 wouldn’t it?

@silab,
A game run by the rich people isn’t any fun. I’m sure you have played other rpg/mmorpg’s before. It isn’t as fun if the richest person has the best gear while the people who actually work for their items has little to show for it.

Cruel! You’re not thinking fourth dimensionally!
Unless you have 1 mithril seed, it would be 26.

Besides there’s still room for scamming.

And by scamming I mean they could drop a hot and cold flower, and two lobsters, and constantly switch between them.[/quote]Oh you meant the extra inventory spot plus the mithril seed I see.

Read full topic

item.title: Gambling update
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“Bowser jr, post:25, topic:509086”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=627330.msg4263322#msg4263322 date=1363664345]

Planted mithril seeds now always grow the same coloured flower, although picking the flower will still result in a randomly coloured flower in your inventory.

Inb4 “Guess what flower pops in my inventory”
[/quote]
True, but you are making it much harder for people to appear trustworthy. You would have better luck by trimming people’s armour.[/quote]
No not really…

Miss Silabsoft:

26 burnt food, 1 free space before for plant.

Essentially this^

You all are forgetting, when you trade a person, it says how many spaces are free in the opposing players inventory.
Trade player before. Check he/she has 27 spaces open (1 taken by seeds). Trade money. It goes in money pouch. they plant. Trade again, verify 26 spaces are taken, no more, no less. If you won, they trade you cash, if they won, trade is canceled.

Read full topic

item.title: Gambling update
item.dc:creator: @Tutorial Tutorial
item.description:
@Tutorial wrote:

I’m glad this will stop gambling, or at least become a huge barrier for gambling. They could have prevented it in a better way; maybe even give players the option of the outcome of some randomized events, so it wouldn’t be chance anymore, but rather choice.

Read full topic

item.title: Gambling update
item.dc:creator: @Spades Spades
item.description:
@Spades wrote:

They could have fixed it long ago, and done a lot better of a job than they currently did.

Just make everything have an option of what you want to do, for the seal just make each color go to a gender. I think it was grey and blue, just make blue boys and grey girls. As for Mithril Seeds, just make it an option with an option for random to get a chance at black/white. The Classic Cape, when worn they could have made a drop-down menu with an option to which emote you would like to perform.

It would have defeated gambling and would have pleased everyone in the process. I posted this suggestion last year when I tried to get back into the game.

Gambling ruined their EoC version of the game, it is far late for them to have fixed it.

Read full topic

item.title: Gambling update
item.dc:creator: @silabsoft RuneAgent
item.description:
@silabsoft wrote:

[quote=“3lv3n snip3r, post:9, topic:509086”][quote author=Miss Silabsoft link=topic=627330.msg4263032#msg4263032 date=1363637646]
Oh look just another way Jagex is controlling the actions of players, really can you call it an RPG anymore seems to me if you don’t fit the mould Jagex deems appropiate you don’t have a role to play.
[/quote]
Gambling ruined everything that has to do with money in the game…[/quote]
noone forced anyone to gamble they do it because they obviously want to do it.

[quote=“Davidi2, post:8, topic:509086”][quote author=Miss Silabsoft link=topic=627330.msg4263032#msg4263032 date=1363637646]
Oh look just another way Jagex is controlling the actions of players, really can you call it an RPG anymore seems to me if you don’t fit the mould Jagex deems appropiate you don’t have a role to play.
[/quote]Couldn’t that be applied to ANY game with ANY rules?[/quote]

yes and no, if its a role playing game behaviors should not be bannable, if you don’t want people spamming chat you change the way the chat system works or offer alternatives. if people want to scam they should be allowed to you will see this kind of action in any fantasy role story or movie why not allow the same elements in games?

Read full topic
